alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 08 at 8:56AM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Through noon Wednesday, total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches possible, with higher amounts up to 10 inches on benches and in the Wasatch Back. From noon Wednesday through Thursday afternoon, another 4 to 10 inches of snow is possible, with higher amounts up to 12 inches on benches and in the Wasatch Back. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Utah Valley, Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow squall conditions are possible Tuesday afternoon and evening, bringing potential impacts to the evening commute. More snowfall is likely beyond Thursday, with more active weather on the way.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
